doc.title: Codec

value.content: A codec (a blend word derived from "**coder-dec**oder") is a program, algorithm, or device that encodes or decodes a data stream. A given codec knows how to handle a specific encoding or compression technology.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Codec on Wikipedia
  • Web video codec guide
  • Web audio codec guide
  • Guide to media types and formats on the web
